definition: to speak evasively (idiom); beating about the bush

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: They really waffled on that question.
sentences.chinese: 他們確實對那個問題閃爍其詞。

sentences.english: She gave me a dubious reply when I asked why she came back so late.
sentences.chinese: 我問她爲什麼回來這麼晚，她回答得閃爍其詞。

sentences.english: Instead, focus on your flight response – the instinct to avoid your partner.
sentences.chinese: 相反，應關注你對伴侶閃爍其詞的本能反應。

sentences.english: We talked about two hours, but he hedged over my questions.
sentences.chinese: 我們談了近兩個小時，但他對我的問題始終閃爍其詞。
他對那個問題閃爍其詞。

sentences.english: On her future, Palin was just as ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 佩林對自己的未來閃爍其詞。
